name: Stop Drop Roll (ZenohParadox)
description:
The player begins by making an awful mistake. They must then choose their path as they panic. Try to survive as long as possible.

Controls: Up arrow key or W key will select upper paths. Down Arrow Key or S key will select lower paths. Also clicking or tapping (on mobile - should work, but not sure) on the upper half or lower half of the screen will also select your path.

You can choose a path before you hit the Y, but if you hit the Y without selecting you will panic in place until you do select a path.

The R key can be used to restart play. After a run the R key or clicking should restart.
